DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of electroanatomic imaging compared to conventional method in patients with VT.
DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy and Safety of CARTO 3D Mapping System Versus Conventional Method in AF and VT
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate the efficacy and safety of electroanatomic imaging (CARTO) compared to conventional fluoroscopically guided activation mapping (Conventional) method in patients with Atrial Fibrillation and Substrate-dependent Ventricular Tachycardia To evaluate cost-effectiveness of CARTO 3D image system compared to conventional method in the same study subjects
DOC.criteria: patients with AF or substratedependent VT administering with anticoagulants
